reviews.review_text: Food was really tasty. Thali was amazing and stuffed crab was delicious. It's always super busy but well managed by Glen, thy dont take reservations.Waiter Shirley (Jesus) is very quick in his work and his service is just outstanding. Must visit place. Tasty food and not so high price.

The restaurant offers a vibrant dining atmosphere, but there are a few considerations to keep in mind. The place is quite popular and can get very crowded, especially during lunch hours, so it’s almost guaranteed that you’ll end up on the waiting list for a table. The parking situation is also challenging, with limited spaces available nearby.

Due to the crowd, the staff might occasionally overlook some small details in your order, but they more than make up for it with their incredibly swift service. The food arrives quickly, beautifully presented, and prepared with evident care. However, the portions are on the smaller side, and the prices are a bit steep for the quantity served.

Overall, it was a good experience, thanks to the speedy service and quality presentation, but be prepared for the busy environment and premium pricing.

Been here to have thali but you get thali till lunch time.
Whatever we ordered it was all good and tasty.the highlight of the evening was blueberry cheesecake it was good for 2 people and soft yummy.
Service was not very impressive because we asked them to pack food and give to us but they forgot to give us so this shows that how lenient they can be.
Rest all was fine I think parking during day would be difficult as the place is very narrow at the end of the road.
Close to margao station.
